body:
Tipped on either end with a glistening diamond, this rune-covered staff allows use of the following spells: 

  • Ice storm (1 charge)
  • Wall of ice (2 charges)
  • Cone of cold (3 charges)
name: Staff of Frost
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Frost
